config.wizard.welcome: Welcome to AI Git Commit Configuration Wizard
error.gitNotRepository: Current directory is not a Git repository
error.config.apiKeyMissing.title: ❌ API Key Not Configured or Invalid
error.config.apiKeyMissing.reason: Reason: No valid API key configuration found
error.config.apiKeyMissing.solutions:
Solutions:
1. Click "Configuration Wizard" button and follow prompts to enter API key
2. Or click "Open Settings" to configure aigitcommit.apiKey
3. Ensure API key is valid and has access permissions
error.config.endpointInvalid.title: ❌ Invalid API Endpoint Configuration
error.config.endpointInvalid.reason: Reason: API endpoint URL format is incorrect or inaccessible
error.config.endpointInvalid.solutions:
Solutions:
1. Click "Open Settings" to check aigitcommit.apiEndpoint configuration
2. Ensure URL format is correct (e.g., https://api.openai.com/v1)
3. If using local service, ensure service is running and accessible
error.config.modelMissing.title: ❌ Model Name Not Configured
error.config.modelMissing.solutions:
Solutions:
1. Click "Configuration Wizard" to set model name
2. Or configure aigitcommit.modelName in settings
3. Common models: gpt-4, gpt-3.5-turbo, claude-3-opus, etc.
error.config.general.title: ❌ Configuration Error
error.config.general.solutions:
Solutions:
Click "Configuration Wizard" to complete initial setup, or click "Open Settings" to configure manually
error.git.notRepository.title: ❌ Current Workspace is Not a Git Repository
error.git.notRepository.reason: Reason: No .git folder found in current directory
error.git.notRepository.solutions:
Solutions:
1. Run git init in terminal to initialize Git repository
2. Or open an existing Git repository
3. Ensure you're in the correct workspace directory
error.git.noChanges.title: ❌ No Changes in Staging Area
error.git.noChanges.reason: Reason: No files staged using git add
error.git.noChanges.solutions:
Solutions:
1. Click "Open Source Control" to view changed files
2. Use git add command or stage files in Source Control view
3. Run this command again after staging to generate commit message
error.git.notFound.title: ❌ Git Not Found
error.git.notFound.reason: Reason: Git is not installed or not added to PATH environment variable
error.git.notFound.solutions:
Solutions:
1. Download and install Git from https://git-scm.com
2. Ensure Git is added to system PATH environment variable
3. Restart VSCode for environment variables to take effect
error.git.general.title: ❌ Git Error
error.git.general.solutions:
Solutions:
Click "Open Source Control" to check Git status, or view logs for detailed error information
error.api.401.title: ❌ API Authentication Failed (401 Unauthorized)
error.api.401.reason: Reason: API key is invalid, expired, or has insufficient permissions
error.api.401.solutions:
Solutions:
1. Check if API key is correctly configured
2. Confirm API key is not expired or revoked
3. Click "Open Settings" to reconfigure API key
4. Click "Retry" after correcting configuration
error.api.403.title: ❌ API Access Denied (403 Forbidden)
error.api.403.reason: Reason: API key has insufficient permissions or account is restricted
error.api.403.solutions:
Solutions:
1. Check if API key has required permissions
2. Confirm account balance is sufficient (if applicable)
3. Verify API endpoint is correct
4. Click "View Logs" for detailed error information
error.api.404.title: ❌ API Endpoint or Model Not Found (404 Not Found)
error.api.404.reason: Reason: API endpoint URL is incorrect or model name doesn't exist
error.api.404.solutions:
Solutions:
1. Check if API endpoint URL is correct
2. Verify model name is correct (e.g., gpt-4, gpt-3.5-turbo)
3. Confirm selected model is available in your API service
4. Click "Open Settings" to correct configuration
error.api.429.title: ❌ API Rate Limit Exceeded (429 Rate Limit)
error.api.429.reason: Reason: Too many requests sent in a short time, triggering rate limit
error.api.429.solutions:
Solutions:
1. Wait a few minutes then click "Retry"
2. Check if other applications are using the same API key
3. Consider upgrading API service plan for higher limits
4. Click "View Logs" to see specific rate limit information
error.api.5xx.title: ❌ API Server Error (5xx Server Error)
error.api.5xx.reason: Reason: API service provider's server encountered an issue
error.api.5xx.solutions:
Solutions:
1. This is a server-side issue, usually temporary
2. Wait a few minutes then click "Retry"
3. Check API service status page
4. If persists, click "View Logs" and contact service provider
error.api.general.title: ❌ API Call Failed
error.api.general.solutions:
Solutions:
1. Click "Retry" to try again
2. Click "View Logs" for detailed error information
3. Check if API configuration is correct
error.network.timeout.title: ❌ Network Request Timeout
error.network.timeout.reason: Reason: Request did not receive response within specified time
error.network.timeout.solutions:
Solutions:
1. Check if network connection is normal
2. If using VPN or proxy, ensure configuration is correct
3. Click "Retry" to try again
4. Consider increasing timeout limit in settings
error.network.refused.title: ❌ Connection Refused (ECONNREFUSED)
error.network.refused.reason: Reason: Target server refused connection or service is not running
error.network.refused.solutions:
Solutions:
1. Check if API endpoint URL is correct
2. If using local service, ensure service is running
3. Verify port number is correct
4. Check if firewall settings are blocking connection
error.network.notFound.title: ❌ Cannot Resolve Domain Name (ENOTFOUND)
error.network.notFound.reason: Reason: DNS cannot resolve target domain name
error.network.notFound.solutions:
Solutions:
1. Check if network connection is normal
2. Verify API endpoint domain name is correct
3. Try using different DNS server
4. Check if proxy configuration is needed
error.network.general.title: ❌ Network Connection Failed
error.network.general.solutions:
Solutions:
1. Check if network connection is normal
2. Verify API endpoint configuration is correct
3. Click "Retry" to try again
4. Click "View Logs" for detailed error information
error.unknown.title: ❌ Unknown Error Occurred
error.unknown.solutions:
Solutions:
1. Click "View Logs" for detailed error information
2. Try restarting VSCode
3. If issue persists, please report on GitHub
error.solution.checkApiKey: Please check if API key is correct
error.solution.checkEndpoint: Please check if API endpoint is correct
git.noChanges: No changes in staging area. Please stage files to commit first.
message.configRequired: API key configuration required to use this feature
